title: Local rigidity of projective smooth horospherical varieties of Picard number two
summary: We study the local rigidity of projective smooth horospherical varieties of rank one and Picard number two. These varieties have been already considered by the second author in a work where their automorphism groups are computed. The results given here are a natural continuation of this work.

AI.tldr: 研究秩为1、Picard数为2的射影光滑horospherical簇的局部刚性
AI.motivation: 这是对第二作者先前工作的自然延续，先前工作计算了这些簇的自同构群，现在研究其局部刚性性质
AI.method: 研究秩为1、Picard数为2的射影光滑horospherical簇的局部刚性性质
AI.result: 给出了这些特殊簇的局部刚性结果
AI.conclusion: 这是对先前自同构群研究的自然延续，为这类特殊代数簇的几何性质提供了更深入的理解

title: Complete Structural Analysis of $q$-Heisenberg Algebras: Homology, Rigidity, Automorphisms, and Deformations
summary: This paper establishes several fundamental structural properties of the $q$-Heisenberg algebra $\mathfrak{h}_n(q)$, a quantum deformation of the classical Heisenberg algebra. We first prove that when $q$ is not a root of unity, the global homological dimension of $\mathfrak{h}_n(q)$ is exactly $3n$, while it becomes infinite when $q$ is a root of unity. We then demonstrate the rigidity of its iterated Ore extension structure, showing that any such presentation is essentially unique up to permutation and scaling of variables. The graded automorphism group is completely determined to be isomorphic to $(\mathbb{C}^*)^{2n} \rtimes S_n$. Furthermore, $\mathfrak{h}_n(q)$ is shown to possess a universal deformation property as the canonical PBW-preserving deformation of the classical Heisenberg algebra $\mathfrak{h}_n(1)$. We compute its Hilbert series as $(1-t)^{-3n}$, confirming polynomial growth of degree $3n$, and establish that its Gelfand--Kirillov dimension coincides with its classical Krull dimension. These results are extended to a generalized multi-parameter version $\mathfrak{H}_n(\mathbf{Q})$, and illustrated through detailed examples and applications in representation theory and deformation quantization.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了q-海森堡代数𝔥ₙ(q)的基本结构性质，包括同调维数、刚性结构、自同构群、变形性质等，并将结果推广到多参数版本。
AI.motivation: 研究量子海森堡代数的基本结构性质，理解其作为经典海森堡代数量子变形的代数特性，为表示理论和变形量子化提供理论基础。
AI.method: 通过代数结构分析、同调代数方法、迭代Ore扩张理论、自同构群计算、Hilbert级数计算等数学工具，系统研究q-海森堡代数的各种代数性质。
AI.result: 当q不是单位根时，全局同调维数为3n；q为单位根时无限。证明了迭代Ore扩张结构的刚性；确定了分级自同构群为(ℂ*)²ⁿ⋊Sₙ；建立了通用变形性质；计算了Hilbert级数为(1-t)⁻³ⁿ；证明了GK维数与经典Krull维数一致。
AI.conclusion: q-海森堡代数具有丰富的代数结构性质，其量子变形保留了经典代数的许多特征，同时展现出新的量子特性，为量子群和变形量子化的研究提供了重要实例。

title: A note on modular properties of non-principal and non-coprincipal admissible $C^{(1)}_2$-modules of integer level
summary: For the affine Lie algebra $C_2^{(1)}$ we study non-principal and non-coprincipal admissible modules of integer level and their quantum Hamiltonian reduction, and show that they have $Γ_0(2)$-modular invariance.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了C_2^(1)仿射李代数的非主和非共主可容许模及其量子哈密顿约化，证明了它们具有Γ_0(2)-模不变性
AI.motivation: 研究仿射李代数C_2^(1)的非主和非共主可容许模的模不变性，扩展对仿射李代数表示理论中模不变性的理解
AI.method: 对C_2^(1)仿射李代数的整数级非主和非共主可容许模进行量子哈密顿约化，分析其模变换性质
AI.result: 证明了这些模具有Γ_0(2)-模不变性，即它们在模群Γ_0(2)的子群作用下保持模变换的协变性
AI.conclusion: C_2^(1)仿射李代数的非主和非共主可容许模经过量子哈密顿约化后展现出特定的模不变性，这为理解仿射李代数表示的模性质提供了新视角

title: Standard symmetrizing forms and Murphy bases of the cyclotomic Hecke algebras
summary: In this paper we compute the explicit value of the standard symmetrizing form of the cyclotomic Hecke algebra of type $G(\ell,1,n)$ on each Murphy basis element. We do this for both the non-degenerate cyclotomic Hecke algebra of type $G(\ell,1,n)$ and the degenerate cyclotomic Hecke algebra of type $G(\ell,1,n)$. As an application, we obtain some equations on the coefficients which occur in the transition matrix between the Murphy basis elements and the seminormal basis elements of the cyclotomic Hecke algebra of type $G(\ell,1,n)$.

AI.tldr: 计算G(ℓ,1,n)型分圆Hecke代数的标准对称化形式在Murphy基元素上的显式值，包括非退化与退化两种情况，并应用于推导Murphy基与半正规基之间转换矩阵系数的方程。
AI.motivation: 研究分圆Hecke代数的对称化形式对于理解其表示理论和组合结构具有重要意义。计算标准对称化形式在Murphy基上的显式值有助于建立不同基之间的转换关系，为深入研究代数结构提供基础工具。
AI.method: 针对G(ℓ,1,n)型分圆Hecke代数，分别处理非退化与退化两种情况，计算标准对称化形式在Murphy基元素上的精确值。利用这些计算结果推导Murphy基与半正规基之间转换矩阵系数的方程。
AI.result: 获得了标准对称化形式在Murphy基元素上的显式计算表达式，并建立了Murphy基与半正规基转换矩阵系数的相关方程，为分圆Hecke代数的组合表示理论提供了新的计算工具。
AI.conclusion: 成功计算了G(ℓ,1,n)型分圆Hecke代数标准对称化形式在Murphy基上的显式值，这一结果为研究代数结构、基变换以及表示理论中的组合问题提供了重要工具，特别有助于理解不同基之间的转换关系。

title: Sharp mapping properties of Poisson transforms and the Baum-Connes conjecture
summary: We prove a sharp, quantitative analogue of Helgason's conjecture at the level of distributions: For a semisimple Lie group $G$ of real rank one, Poisson transforms map a Sobolev space on $P\backslash G$ boundedly with closed range to an $L^2$-space on $K\backslash G$. The result is obtained for the Poisson transform studied by Knapp-Wallach under the name Szegö map, and the appropriate Sobolev spaces are defined using van Erp-Yuncken's Heisenberg calculus. The proof generalizes to show that commutators of this Poisson transform with smooth functions on the Furstenberg compactification are compact. This proves the remaining open conjecture in Julg's seminal program to establish the Baum-Connes conjecture for closed subgroups of semisimple Lie groups of real rank one.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了实秩为一的半单李群上Helgason猜想在分布层面的定量类比，建立了Poisson变换在Sobolev空间和L^2空间之间的有界闭范围映射，并解决了Julg纲领中关于Baum-Connes猜想的剩余开放问题。
AI.motivation: 研究实秩为一的半单李群上的Helgason猜想，旨在建立Poisson变换在分布层面的定量性质，并为解决Julg纲领中关于Baum-Connes猜想的开放问题提供关键工具。
AI.method: 使用Knapp-Wallach研究的Szegö映射作为Poisson变换，通过van Erp-Yuncken的海森堡微积分定义适当的Sobolev空间，证明Poisson变换在这些Sobolev空间和L^2空间之间的有界闭范围映射性质。
AI.result: 证明了Poisson变换在Sobolev空间和L^2空间之间的有界闭范围映射，并推广到该Poisson变换与Furstenberg紧化上光滑函数的交换子是紧算子，从而解决了Julg纲领中关于Baum-Connes猜想的剩余开放问题。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为实秩为一的半单李群建立了Helgason猜想的定量分布理论，完成了Julg纲领中关于Baum-Connes猜想证明的关键步骤，为相关领域提供了重要的数学工具。

title: On (super)symmetrizing forms and Schur elements of cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford algebras
comment: Fixed several typos and slightly modified the structure. Comments welcome
summary: In this paper, we introduce Schur elements for supersymmetrizing superalgebras. We show that the cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford algebra $\mathcal{H}^f_{c}(n)$ is supersymmetric if $f=f^{(\mathtt{0})}_{\underline{Q}}$ and, symmetric if $f=f^{(\mathtt{s})}_{\underline{Q}}$ and an invertibility condition holds. In the semisimple case, we compute the Schur elements for both $\mathcal{H}^f_{c}(n)$ and the cyclotomic Sergeev algebra $\mathcal{h}^g_{c}(n)$. As applications, we define new symmetrizing forms on the Hecke-Clifford algebra $\mathcal{H}(n)$ and on the cyclotomic quiver Hecke algebras of types $A^{(1)}_{e-1}$ and $C^{(1)}_e$.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了超对称化超代数的Schur元素，证明了在特定条件下Hecke-Clifford代数是超对称或对称的，并计算了半单情况下的Schur元素，应用于定义新的对称化形式。
AI.motivation: 研究超对称化超代数的Schur元素，探索Hecke-Clifford代数的对称性质，为相关代数结构提供新的对称化工具。
AI.method: 引入超对称化超代数的Schur元素概念，分析Hecke-Clifford代数在特定参数条件下的对称性质，计算半单情况下的Schur元素，并将其应用于定义新的对称化形式。
AI.result: 证明了当f=f^{(\mathtt{0})}_{\underline{Q}}时Hecke-Clifford代数是超对称的，当f=f^{(\mathtt{s})}_{\underline{Q}}且满足可逆条件时是对称的；计算了半单情况下Hecke-Clifford代数和Sergeev代数的Schur元素；定义了Hecke-Clifford代数和quiver Hecke代数上的新对称化形式。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了超对称化超代数的Schur元素理论，为Hecke-Clifford代数和相关代数结构提供了新的对称化工具，拓展了对称化形式的研究范围。

title: The BPS decomposition theorem
comment: 21 pages. v3: Title and abstract changed. Section 6 added. v2:Appendix B added
summary:
We prove the BPS decomposition theorem (a.k.a. cohomological integrality theorem) decomposing the cohomology of smooth symmetric stacks into the Weyl-invariant part of the cohomological Hall induction of the intersection cohomology of good moduli spaces. As a consequence, we establish the BPS decomposition theorem for the Borel--Moore homology of $0$-shifted symplectic stacks and for the critical cohomology of symmetric $(-1)$-shifted symplectic stacks, thereby generalizing the main result of Bu--Davison--Ibáñez Nuñez--Kinjo--Pădurariu to the non-orthogonal setting.
  We will present three applications of our main result. First, we confirm Halpern-Leistner's conjecture on the purity of the Borel--Moore homology of $0$-shifted symplectic stacks admitting proper good moduli spaces, extending Davison's work on the moduli stack of objects in $2$-Calabi--Yau categories. Second, we prove versions of Kirwan surjectivity for the critical cohomology of symmetric $(-1)$-shifted symplectic stacks and for the Borel--Moore homology of $0$-shifted symplectic stacks. Finally, by applying our main result to the character stacks associated with compact oriented $3$-manifolds, we reduce the quantum geometric Langlands duality conjecture for $3$-manifolds, as formulated by Safronov, from an isomorphism between infinite-dimensional critical cohomologies to a comparison of finite-dimensional BPS cohomologies.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了BPS分解定理，将光滑对称叠的上同调分解为良好模空间交上同调的Weyl不变部分，并推广到0-移位辛叠和(-1)-移位辛叠的Borel-Moore同调，给出了三个重要应用。
AI.motivation: 研究对称叠的上同调结构，建立BPS分解定理以统一处理不同几何背景下的上同调理论，特别是推广Bu-Davison等人的结果到非正交情形，并为量子几何朗兰兹对偶提供数学基础。
AI.method: 证明BPS分解定理（上同调整性定理），通过将光滑对称叠的上同调分解为良好模空间交上同调的Weyl不变部分。该方法推广到0-移位辛叠的Borel-Moore同调和(-1)-移位辛叠的临界上同调。
AI.result: 1. 证明了BPS分解定理，推广了Bu-Davison等人的主要结果到非正交情形；2. 确认了Halpern-Leistner关于0-移位辛叠Borel-Moore同调纯性的猜想；3. 证明了Kirwan满射性的版本；4. 将Safronov的量子几何朗兰兹对偶猜想从无限维临界上同调的同构约化为有限维BPS上同调的比较。
AI.conclusion: BPS分解定理为对称叠的上同调理论提供了统一框架，不仅推广了现有结果，还为量子几何朗兰兹对偶等深层次数学问题提供了新的工具和视角，具有重要的理论意义和应用价值。

title: Reflexive dg categories in algebra and topology
comment: 43 pages, 2 figures. Comments welcome! v2: some results generalised, exposition improved
summary: Reflexive dg categories were introduced by Kuznetsov and Shinder to abstract the duality between bounded and perfect derived categories. In particular this duality relates their Hochschild cohomologies, autoequivalence groups, and semiorthogonal decompositions. We establish reflexivity in a variety of settings including affine schemes, simple-minded collections, chain and cochain dg algebras of topological spaces, Ginzburg dg algebras, and Fukaya categories of cotangent bundles and surfaces as well as the closely related class of graded gentle algebras. Our proofs are based on the interplay of reflexivity with gluings, derived completions, and Koszul duality. In particular we show that for certain (co)connective dg algebras, reflexivity is equivalent to derived completeness.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了反射性dg范畴在不同数学背景下的建立，包括仿射概形、简单集合、拓扑空间的链和上链dg代数、Ginzburg dg代数、余切丛和曲面的Fukaya范畴等，证明了反射性与粘合、导出完备性和Koszul对偶的关系。
AI.motivation: Kuznetsov和Shinder引入的反射性dg范畴旨在抽象有界导出范畴和完美导出范畴之间的对偶关系。这种对偶关系联系了它们的Hochschild上同调、自等价群和半正交分解。论文旨在在各种数学背景下建立反射性，以深化对这一对偶关系的理解。
AI.method: 通过研究反射性与粘合、导出完备性和Koszul对偶之间的相互作用来建立反射性。特别地，对于某些（上）连通dg代数，证明了反射性等价于导出完备性。
AI.result: 在多种数学背景下成功建立了反射性，包括：仿射概形、简单集合、拓扑空间的链和上链dg代数、Ginzburg dg代数、余切丛和曲面的Fukaya范畴，以及密切相关的分级温和代数类。
AI.conclusion: 反射性dg范畴的概念在不同数学领域具有广泛适用性，其与导出完备性的等价关系为理解有界导出范畴和完美导出范畴之间的对偶关系提供了新的视角和工具。

title: Holographic duality from Howe duality: Chern-Simons gravity as an ensemble of code CFTs
summary: We discuss the holographic correspondence between 3d "Chern-Simons gravity" and an ensemble of 2d Narain code CFTs. Starting from 3d abelian Chern-Simons theory, we construct an ensemble of boundary CFTs defined by gauging all possible maximal subgroups of the bulk one-form symmetry. Each maximal non-anomalous subgroup is isomorphic to a classical even self-dual error-correcting code over $\mathbb Z_p\times \mathbb Z_p$, providing a way to define a boundary "code CFT." The average over the ensemble of such theories is holographically dual to Chern-Simons gravity, a bulk theory summed over 3d topologies sharing the same boundary. In the case of prime $p$, the sum reduces to that over handlebodies, i.e. becomes the Poincaré series akin to that in semiclassical gravity. As the main result of the paper, we show that the mathematical identity underlying this holographic duality can be understood and rigorously proven using the framework of Howe duality over finite fields. This framework is concerned with the representation theory of two commuting groups forming a dual pair: the symplectic group of modular transformations of the boundary, and an orthogonal group mapping codes to each other. Finally, we reformulate the holographic duality as an identity between different averages over quantum stabilizer states, providing an interpretation in terms of quantum information theory.

AI.tldr: 本文建立了3维陈-西蒙斯引力与2维Narain码CFT系综的全息对应关系，通过有限域上的Howe对偶框架严格证明了这一数学恒等式。
AI.motivation: 研究3维陈-西蒙斯引力与2维共形场论之间的全息对应关系，特别是探索通过量子纠错码构造边界CFT系综的方法，建立严格的数学基础。
AI.method: 从3维阿贝尔陈-西蒙斯理论出发，通过规范所有可能的体单形式对称性的最大子群来构造边界CFT系综。每个最大非反常子群同构于经典偶自对偶纠错码，从而定义边界"码CFT"。使用有限域上的Howe对偶框架，基于辛群和正交群的对偶对表示理论，严格证明全息对偶的数学恒等式。
AI.result: 证明了陈-西蒙斯引力与Narain码CFT系综之间的全息对应关系，当p为素数时，求和简化为手柄体的求和，类似于半经典引力中的庞加莱级数。将全息对偶重新表述为不同量子稳定子态平均之间的恒等式，提供了量子信息理论的解释。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了3维陈-西蒙斯引力与2维Narain码CFT系综之间的全息对应关系，通过有限域上的Howe对偶框架提供了严格的数学证明，并将该对偶关系与量子信息理论中的量子稳定子态联系起来。

title: Representations of Hamiltonian Lie algebras
summary: We consider the Shen-Larsson functor from the category of modules for the symplectic Lie algebra $\s$ to the category of modules for the Hamiltonian Lie algebra and show that it preserves the irreducibility except in the finite number of cases. The obtained irreducible modules for the Hamiltonian Lie algebra are cuspidal, whose weight multiplicities equal the dimension of the corresponding module of the symplectic Lie algebra. This extends well-known results for other Cartan type Lie algebras to the Hamiltonian case.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了从辛李代数模范畴到哈密顿李代数模范畴的Shen-Larsson函子，证明该函子在有限个例外情况下保持不可约性，并将已知的Cartan型李代数结果推广到哈密顿情形。
AI.motivation: 将Cartan型李代数中已知的不可约模构造结果扩展到哈密顿李代数情形，建立辛李代数与哈密顿李代数模范畴之间的联系。
AI.method: 使用Shen-Larsson函子从辛李代数模范畴映射到哈密顿李代数模范畴，分析该函子对不可约性的保持性质，并计算所得模的权重重数。
AI.result: 证明Shen-Larsson函子在有限个例外情况下保持不可约性，所得哈密顿李代数不可约模是尖的(cuspidal)，其权重重数等于对应辛李代数模的维数。
AI.conclusion: 成功将Cartan型李代数的已知结果推广到哈密顿情形，建立了辛李代数与哈密顿李代数模范畴之间的系统性联系，为哈密顿李代数的表示理论提供了新构造。

title: Homology of Segre powers of Boolean and subspace lattices
comment: 25 pages, 1 figure, 1 table. This version updates v3 by correcting some minor typos in Figure 1 and its description. arXiv2408.08421v2 (Version 2) was split into two parts. This is the main part. The second part, whose main results are in Section 2, Theorems 2.6 and 2.7 of arXiv2408.08421v2 (Version 2), has been submitted for publication and will be posted to arXiv separately
summary: Segre products of posets were defined by Björner and Welker (2005). We investigate the homology representations of the $t$-fold Segre power $B_n^{(t)}$ of the Boolean lattice $B_n$. The direct product $\sym_n^{\times t}$ of the symmetric group $\sym_n$ acts on the homology of rank-selected subposets of $B_n^{(t)}$. We give an explicit formula for the decomposition into $\sym_n^{\times t}$-irreducibles of the homology of the full poset, as well as formulas for the diagonal action of the symmetric group $\sym_n$. For the rank-selected homology, we show that the stable principal specialisation of the product Frobenius characteristic of the $\sym_n^{\times t}$-module coincides with the corresponding rank-selected invariant of the $t$-fold Segre power of the subspace lattice.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了布尔格$B_n$的$t$重Segre幂$B_n^{(t)}$的同调表示，分析了对称群$\sym_n^{\times t}$在秩选择子偏序集同调上的作用，给出了不可约分解公式。
AI.motivation: 研究偏序集的Segre积的同调表示，特别是布尔格的$t$重Segre幂的对称群作用下的同调分解，旨在理解这些组合结构的表示理论性质。
AI.method: 通过分析对称群$\sym_n^{\times t}$在秩选择子偏序集同调上的作用，推导出同调的不可约分解公式。特别关注对角对称群$\sym_n$的作用，并建立与子空间格的$t$重Segre幂的秩选择不变量的联系。
AI.result: 给出了$B_n^{(t)}$全偏序集同调在$\sym_n^{\times t}$作用下的显式不可约分解公式，以及对称群$\sym_n$对角作用的分解公式。证明了秩选择同调的稳定主特殊化与子空间格的$t$重Segre幂的相应秩选择不变量一致。
AI.conclusion: 成功分析了布尔格Segre幂的同调表示，建立了组合表示理论中的重要联系，为理解偏序集Segre积的表示性质提供了理论基础。

title: A description of the integral depth-$r$ Bernstein center
comment: 36 pages. Some remarks were added, author order was corrected and the introduction was slightly modified
summary: In this paper we give a description of the depth-$r$ Bernstein center for non-negative integers $r$ of a reductive simply connected group $G$ over a non-archimedean local field as a limit of depth-$r$ standard parahoric Hecke algebras. Using the description, we construct maps from the algebra of stable functions on the $r$-th Moy-Prasad filtration quotient of hyperspecial parahorics to the depth-$r$ Bernstein center and use them to attach to each depth-$r$ irreducible representation $π$ an invariant $θ(π)$, called the depth-$r$ Deligne-Lusztig parameter of $π$. We show that $θ(π)$ is equal to the semi-simple part of minimal $K$-types of $π$.

AI.tldr: 本文描述了单连通约化群的深度-r Bernstein中心作为深度-r标准抛物Hecke代数的极限，并构造了从超特殊抛物子群第r层Moy-Prasad滤过商上的稳定函数代数到深度-r Bernstein中心的映射，为每个深度-r不可约表示π定义深度-r Deligne-Lusztig参数θ(π)，证明其等于π的极小K型的半单部分。
AI.motivation: 研究非阿基米德局部域上单连通约化群的深度-r Bernstein中心的结构，建立深度-r表示与代数几何参数之间的联系，为表示论中的深度分类提供新的代数工具。
AI.method: 1. 将深度-r Bernstein中心描述为深度-r标准抛物Hecke代数的极限；2. 构造从超特殊抛物子群第r层Moy-Prasad滤过商上的稳定函数代数到深度-r Bernstein中心的映射；3. 为每个深度-r不可约表示π定义深度-r Deligne-Lusztig参数θ(π)；4. 证明θ(π)等于π的极小K型的半单部分。
AI.result: 1. 获得了深度-r Bernstein中心的极限描述；2. 成功构造了从稳定函数代数到Bernstein中心的映射；3. 定义了深度-r Deligne-Lusztig参数θ(π)；4. 证明了θ(π)与极小K型半单部分的一致性。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了深度-r Bernstein中心的代数描述，构造了深度-r表示与代数参数之间的对应关系，证明了深度-r Deligne-Lusztig参数与极小K型半单部分的等价性，为深度分类理论提供了新的视角和工具。

title: Algebraic cycles and Hitchin systems
comment: Accepted version; to appear at Annales Scientifiques de l'École Normale Supérieure. 48 pages
summary:
The purpose of this paper is to study motivic aspects of the Hitchin system for $\mathrm{GL}_n$. Our results include the following. (a) We prove the motivic decomposition conjecture of Corti-Hanamura for the Hitchin system; in particular, the decomposition theorem associated with the Hitchin system is induced by algebraic cycles. This yields an unconditional construction of the motivic perverse filtration for the Hitchin system, which lifts the cohomological/sheaf-theoretic perverse filtration. (b) We prove that the inverse of the relative Hard Lefschetz symmetry is induced by a relative algebraic correspondence, confirming the relative Lefschetz standard conjecture for the Hitchin system. (c) We show a strong perversity bound for the normalized Chern classes of a universal bundle with respect to the motivic perverse filtration; this specializes to the sheaf-theoretic result obtained earlier by Maulik-Shen. (d) We prove a $χ$-independence result for the relative Chow motives associated with Hitchin systems.
  Our methods combine Fourier transforms for compactified Jacobian fibrations associated with integral locally planar curves, nearby and vanishing cycle techniques, and a Springer-theoretic interpretation of parabolic Hitchin moduli spaces.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了GL_n Hitchin系统的动机方面，证明了Corti-Hanamura的动机分解猜想，构建了动机perverse滤过，验证了相对Lefschetz标准猜想，并展示了关于Chern类的强perversity界。
AI.motivation: 研究GL_n Hitchin系统的动机方面，特别是验证Corti-Hanamura的动机分解猜想，构建动机perverse滤过，并探索相对Lefschetz标准猜想在Hitchin系统中的表现。
AI.method: 结合了积分局部平面曲线的紧化Jacobian纤维化的傅里叶变换、邻近和消失循环技术，以及抛物型Hitchin模空间的Springer理论解释。
AI.result: (a) 证明了Corti-Hanamura的动机分解猜想；(b) 验证了相对Lefschetz标准猜想；(c) 展示了关于通用丛归一化Chern类的强perversity界；(d) 证明了Hitchin系统相关相对Chow动机的χ-独立性结果。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功地将动机理论应用于Hitchin系统，建立了多个重要的动机性质，为理解Hitchin系统的代数几何结构提供了新的视角和工具。

title: Asymptotics in infinite monoidal categories
comment: 21 pages, many figures, to appear in High. Struct., comments welcome
summary: We discuss formulas for the asymptotic growth rate of the number of summands in tensor powers in certain (finite or infinite) monoidal categories. Our focus is on monoidal categories with infinitely many indecomposable objects, with our main tools being generalized Perron-Frobenius theory alongside techniques from random walks.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了在具有无限多不可分解对象的幺半范畴中，张量幂的直和项数量渐近增长率的计算公式，主要使用广义Perron-Frobenius理论和随机游走技术。
AI.motivation: 研究幺半范畴中张量幂的直和项数量渐近增长率，特别是在具有无限多不可分解对象的范畴中，这类问题在表示论、量子群和数学物理中有重要应用。
AI.method: 使用广义Perron-Frobenius理论和随机游走技术作为主要工具，分析无限幺半范畴中张量幂的渐近行为。
AI.result: 推导出在特定（有限或无限）幺半范畴中，张量幂的直和项数量渐近增长率的计算公式。
AI.conclusion: 通过结合广义Perron-Frobenius理论和随机游走方法，成功建立了无限幺半范畴中张量幂渐近增长率的计算框架，为相关数学领域提供了新的分析工具。

title: A Jacobian Criterion for Artin $v$-stacks
comment: Accepted Version. To appear in Selecta
summary: We prove a generalization of the Jacobian criterion of Fargues-Scholze for spaces of sections of a smooth quasi-projective variety over the Fargues-Fontaine curve. Namely, we show how to use their criterion to deduce an analogue for spaces of sections of a smooth Artin stack over the (schematic) Fargues-Fontaine curve obtained by taking the stack quotient of a smooth quasi-projective variety by the action of a linear algebraic group. As an application, we show various moduli stacks appearing in the Fargues-Scholze geometric Langlands program are cohomologically smooth Artin $v$-stacks and compute their $\ell$-dimensions.

AI.tldr: 该论文推广了Fargues-Scholze的雅可比判别法，将其应用于光滑Artin栈在Fargues-Fontaine曲线上的截面空间，并应用于几何朗兰兹纲领中的模栈。
AI.motivation: Fargues-Scholze的雅可比判别法原本适用于光滑拟射影簇在Fargues-Fontaine曲线上的截面空间。本文旨在将该判别法推广到更一般的Artin栈情形，特别是由线性代数群作用的光滑拟射影簇的栈商，这对于几何朗兰兹纲领中的模栈研究具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过利用Fargues-Scholze的原始判别法，推导出适用于光滑Artin栈在Fargues-Fontaine曲线上截面空间的类似判别准则。该方法处理由线性代数群作用的光滑拟射影簇的栈商情形。
AI.result: 成功证明了推广的雅可比判别法，并应用该结果证明了Fargues-Scholze几何朗兰兹纲领中出现的各种模栈是上同调光滑的Artin v-栈，同时计算了它们的ℓ-维数。
AI.conclusion: 该研究扩展了Fargues-Scholze判别法的适用范围，为几何朗兰兹纲领中模栈的几何性质研究提供了重要工具，特别是证明了相关模栈的上同调光滑性并计算了其维数。
